Cal Poly defeated UC Davis 86-76 in their Big West Conference Tournament first-round game on March 12, 2025. The Mustangs overcame a nine-point halftime deficit with a dominant second-half performance, outscoring the Aggies 48-29 after intermission[1][2][3][4]. Key contributors included Owen Koonce (18 points, 6 assists), Isaac Jessup (17 points, 4 three-pointers), and Jarred Hyder (16 points)[2][3]. UC Davis' Pablo Tamba scored a career-high 25 points in the losing effort[4].

**Game Breakdown**  
- **First Half**: UC Davis led 47-38 after shooting 65.2% from the field[1][3]  
- **Second Half**: Cal Poly shot 66.7% (20/30 FG) and went on a 21-2 run to take control[3][6]  
- **Key Difference**: Cal Poly scored 32 paint points vs UC Davis' 18[1]  

The outcome meets the resolution criteria specified in the ancillary data, as the game was completed as scheduled with a decisive result.
